masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"This is impossible—a localized blizzard is forming over downtown, but the weather patterns don't support it. Temperature's dropping to -40. There's a woman at the center of it, floating, creating ice from nothing. She's screaming about making 'winter last forever.' The city is FREEZING."

Requirements

  • Confront the Ice Queen at the storm's center
  • Stop the blizzard before the city freezes
  • Find out what drove her to this—can she be reasoned with?
